# Each bit represents the connection to the nearby block from this block
# Up (bit 0), Right (bit 1), Down (bit 2), Left (bit 3)

# Row 0
0b0011
0b1001
0b0001
0b0011
0b1010
0b1001
0b0001
0b0001

0b0101
0b0110
0b1100
0b0101
0b0001
0b0101
0b0110
0b1101

0b0101
0b0011
0b1011
0b1110

0b1111

0b1101

0b0101
0b0101

0b1011

0b0101

0b0101

0b0100
